changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
Remove wilayah_indonesia.sql
This commit removes the file "wilayah_indonesia.sql" It previously contained detailed SQL code for the structure and data of the database 'wilayah_indonesia'. The file is no longer needed as the database has been migrated to another infrastructure.

task.summary: Refactor: Remove unnecessary line breaks and alignment adjustments in permintaan.php ðŸ§¹

MESSAGE.value:
Remove wilayah_indonesia.sql
This commit removes the file "wilayah_indonesia.sql" It previously contained detailed SQL code for the structure and data of the database 'wilayah_indonesia'. The file is no longer needed as the database has been migrated to another infrastructure.
Refactor: Move CSS changes and fix request page issues
Refine the design of the `permintaan.php` interface: adjust spacing
Refine the design of the `permintaan.php` interface: adjust spacing, add rounded corners, and enhance the appearance of the request table
Fixes minor styling and updates code comments
Mengubah tata letak permintaan, menambahkan gaya tabel, dan memperbarui kode pen
Mengubah tata letak permintaan, menambahkan gaya tabel, dan memperbarui kode pencacahan
âœ¨ Refactor: Improved table styling and user experience
Fixes: Collapse all buttons active state and other display issues
Refactor: Implement responsive table layout and improve table styling
Refactor: Remove unnecessary line breaks and alignment adjustments in permintaan.php

- Refactor: Revise MySQL database access
This commit updates the MySQL database access

- Refactor: Revise MySQL database access
This commit updates the MySQL database access to use PHP Data Objects (PDO) for a more modern and secure approach.
Additionally, it:
- Removes the dependency on the deprecated `mysql_*

- Refactor: Revise MySQL database access
This commit updates the MySQL database access to use PHP Data Objects (PDO) for a more modern and secure approach.
Additionally, it:
- Removes the dependency on the deprecated `mysql_* - Refactor: Move CSS changes and fix request page issues

- Refactor: Revise MySQL database access
This commit updates the MySQL database access to use PHP Data Objects (PDO) for a more modern and secure approach.
Additionally, it:
- Removes the dependency on the deprecated `mysql_*` functions - Enhances error handling and reporting - Adds support for prepared statements to prevent SQL injection attacks - Includes logging for database-related activities - Refactor: Move CSS changes and fix request page issues
- Refactor: Improved table styling and user experience

- Refactor: Convert PostgreSQL to lower case
This commit refactors the PostgreSQL database - Refactor: Improved table styling and user experience

- Refactor: Convert PostgreSQL to lower case
This commit refactors the PostgreSQL database and table names to lower case to match the conventions used in the application. This is done to ensure consistency and clarity throughout the codebase. - Refactor: Improved table styling and user experience

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
- Refactor: Convert PostgreSQL to lower case
This commit refactors the PostgreSQL database and table names to lower case to match the conventions used in the application. This is done to ensure consistency and clarity throughout the codebase. - Refactor: Improved table styling and user experience
